Lijiang prefecture-level city in northwest Yunnan
Lijiang prefecture in northwest Yunnan
Lijiang Naxi Autonomous County in Yunnan
pinyin: Li4 jiang1 Na4 xi1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: Lijiang old town (in Yunnan)

sentences.english: Lijiang is located in Lijing Prefecture in the Northwest of Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 丽江位于云南省西北部。

sentences.english: This is the Stone Town in Lijiang, Baoshan Township.
sentences.chinese: 这就是丽江的宝山石头城。

sentences.english: Morning, drive to Lijiang, the cultural center of the Naxi Minority.
sentences.chinese: 早上，乘车至丽江，这里是纳西族的文化中心。

sentences.english: I laud the people of Lijang.
sentences.chinese: 我可是赞美丽江的人民。

sentences.english: The scenic spots are mainly scattered in Lijiang County and Ninglang County.
sentences.chinese: 该景区主要分布在丽江县和宁蒗县。

sentences.english: The Square Street at the Center of the Ancient Town is a typical example of ancient streets in Lijiang.
sentences.chinese: 位于古城中心的四方街是丽江古街的代表。

sentences.english: The photo shows the construction commencement ceremony of the Dali Highway.
sentences.chinese: 图为大理至丽江高速公路开工奠基仪式。

sentences.english: We lived in Lijiang. We lived there until 1950.
sentences.chinese: 我们在丽江一直待到了1950年。

sentences.english: The most famous Food Street of Lijiang is located in Square Street side.
sentences.chinese: 丽江著名的美食街坐落在四方街旁边。

sentences.english: The Black Dragon Pond is located outside Lijiang, Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 黑龙潭位于云南丽江市郊。

sentences.english: There are also about five long-distance buses daily to Dali and Lijiang.
sentences.chinese: 每天大约有5班长途班车开往大理和丽江。

sentences.english: After about two hours, we went back to the Old City.
sentences.chinese: 在拉市海逗留了大概2个小时，又坐车返回丽江古城。

sentences.english: We went back to visit Lijiang and Shangrila.
sentences.chinese: 我们重游了丽江和香格里拉。

sentences.english: The Dayan Old Town is a World Historical and Cultural City.
sentences.chinese: 丽江大研古城是世界历史文化名城。

sentences.english: On the sixth day, and other Lijiang, Kunming impression.
sentences.chinese: 第六天，再别丽江，昆明印象。

sentences.english: As I approach Lijiang, I feel disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 快到丽江时，我感到了失望。
